analyzed: dhamma anuloma paccanīya tika duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: Abyākataṁ lokiyaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā naabyākato nalokiyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: abyākatam lokiyam dhammam paccayā na abyākataḥ na lokiyaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Abyākataṁ lokiyaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā nakusalo nalokiyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

original: Abyākataṁ lokiyaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā naakusalo nalokiyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

original: Abyākataṁ lokiyaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā naakusalo nalokiyo ca naabyākato nalokiyo ca dhammā
analyzed: abyākatam lokiyam dhammam paccayā na akusalaḥ na lokiyaḥ ca na abyākataḥ na lokiyaḥ ca dhammā

analyzed: uppajjanti hetu paccayā abyākatam lokiyam dhammam paccayā na kusalaḥ na lokiyaḥ ca na akusalo

original: nalokiyo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. Hetuyā pañca …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate pañca.
analyzed: ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā hetuyā pañca pe vipāke tīṇi pe avigate pañca
